- **No reproducible steps** — reporter says "no idea" how to reproduce

- **Intermittent focus loss** — keyboard input stops working "after some time", only restart fixes it
- **Old version** (1.76.x) on old Windows (1803)
- **No comments** or follow-up from anyone
- **Classic WinForms focus bug** — likely related to ActiveX/RDP control stealing focus, a well-known class of issue in mRemoteNG with no clear root cause without reproduction steps
